turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order some pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I got a large party, so I'd like four medium pizza all within crust. For the first pizza, I'd like a barbecue. On the second pizza. I'd like a veggies lovers. On the third pizza, I'd like a meat lovers. And on the last, pizza I'd like pizza with sardines on it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, for the first pizza, did you want bbq chicken or just bbq sauce with cheese?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can they make half and half?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i'll note that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Okay.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 medium thin crust pizzas, one bbq chicken on one side and bbq sauce and cheese on the other, 1 veggie lovers, 1 meatlovers, and 1 with sardines, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. And I would like all of them to have thin crusts.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, i'll add that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cool cool, yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $76, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine-in, pick up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 40 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. No, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much.
